entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 23. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Thursday 21 April 2016
